DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The objective proposal study safety efficacy metformin add insulin treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) among pregnant woman . Participants : 1200 pregnant woman type 2 diabetes complicate pregnancy 10 U.S. clinical center Procedures ( method ) : Pregnant woman T2DM 10 week 20 week 6 day singleton fetus randomize insulin/placebo versus insulin/metformin . Primary outcome composite adverse neonatal outcome ( clinically relevant hypoglycemia , birth trauma , hyperbilirubinemia , stillbirth/neonatal death ) . Study visit monthly clinical visit ; blood draw 24-30 week . Maternal infant outcome chart abstract .
